mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Dayspring, George
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Dayspring, George Patient Age: 25. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture right shoulder. Bullet entered 2 inches below the acromial extemity of the clavicle and 2 inches above the axillary border of the pectoralis major muscle. Bullet lodged fracturing the glenoid cavity and head of humurus. Location Wounded: Piedmont, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/06/05. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Discharged from service.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Dayspring, George
